items.translation: I didn't come to work because I got sick
Although it was very cold, we went for a walk in the park
He studies at university to become a doctor
The book that I'm reading now is very interesting
When I came home, mom had already made dinner
Despite the heavy rain, they played football
I'm calling you to invite you to a concert
The city where I was born is located in the south of Ukraine
While he was sleeping, I made breakfast and coffee
After finishing university, he moved to Kyiv
Because I have to get up early tomorrow, I'm going to bed now
The friend with whom I talked works as a programmer
